      Methods in org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.cell.utility with parameters of type CNetworkProperties 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static long CapacityUtility.availableCapacity​(TransmissionMode mode, CNetworkProperties region, CellConfiguration nodeCellConfiguration)
      The method returns the available bandwidth for a node in a region.
      static long DelayUtility.calculateDelay​(CNetworkProperties region, TransmissionMode mode, String nodeId, RandomNumberGenerator rng)
      Calculates the core delay for the given region.
      static void CapacityUtility.consumeCapacity​(TransmissionMode mode, CNetworkProperties region, CellConfiguration nodeCellConfiguration, long consume)
      Consumes some of the available bandwidth based on the given message.
      static void RegionCapacityUtility.consumeCapacityDown​(CNetworkProperties region, long bandwidthToConsumeInBps)
      Consumes the capacity in a region in the downlink direction.
      static void RegionCapacityUtility.consumeCapacityUp​(CNetworkProperties region, long bandwidthToConsumeInBps)
      Consumes the capacity in a region in the uplink direction.
      static TransmissionResult RetransmissionLossUtility.determineTransmissionAttempts​(RandomNumberGenerator rng, CNetworkProperties region, TransmissionMode mode)
      Determine the number and success of the transmission attempts for the given message in the according region with the help of the DirectTransmission.
      static void RegionCapacityUtility.freeCapacityDown​(CNetworkProperties region, long bandwidthToFreeInBps)
      Frees bandwidth for the given region.
      static void RegionCapacityUtility.freeCapacityUp​(CNetworkProperties region, long bandwidthToFreeInBps)
      Frees bandwidth for the given region in case the message was successfully delivered.
      static List<String> RegionUtility.getNodesForRegion​(CNetworkProperties region)
      Gets all nodes in the given region.
      static boolean CapacityUtility.isAvailable​(TransmissionMode mode, CNetworkProperties region, CellConfiguration nodeCellConfiguration)
      Checks whether a new transmission is possible or whether the minimal bandwidths are undershot.
      static boolean RegionCapacityUtility.isAvailable​(TransmissionMode mode, CNetworkProperties region)
      This methods checks whether the region has enough capacity left to allow a new transmission in that region.
      static boolean CapacityUtility.isCapacitySufficient​(TransmissionMode mode, CNetworkProperties region, CellConfiguration nodeCellConfiguration, long neededBandwidth)
      Checks if the bandwidth of the given region and of the given node is sufficient to perform the transmission.
      static boolean RegionCapacityUtility.isCapacitySufficient​(TransmissionMode mode, CNetworkProperties region, long neededBandwidthInBps)
      Checks if the message is deliverable for the given region depending on needed bandwidth, the available capacity and the transmission mode.
      static boolean RegionCapacityUtility.isCapacitySufficientDown​(CNetworkProperties region, long neededBandwidthInBps)
      Checks if the message is deliverable for the given region in dependency of the needed bandwidth and the available capacity in the downlink direction.
      static boolean RegionCapacityUtility.isCapacitySufficientUp​(CNetworkProperties region, long neededBandwidthInBps)
      Checks if the message is deliverable for the given region in dependency of the needed bandwidth and the available capacity in the uplink direction.
